li.p: The Current-Limiting Reactor must be installed by licensed electricians or by Eaton-authorized technicians.
Installers should use Lock-Out/Tag-Out procedures and observe other precautions listed in the Safety section.
Power wiring and grounding must comply with NEC and applicable local codes.

body.p: There are symmetric ABCNG power connections on both the left and right sides of the unit (see ).
Utility or other input power is connected on one side and output on the other side, but the sides can be reversed. The Reactor does not have directional power flow.
The switchgear manufacturer or the installer shall provide necessary linking connections in the form of flexible cables or busbars.
